A homepage displaying featured technical articles and solutions
A dedicated page for browsing technical articles with pagination or infinite scroll
A search functionality allowing users to query technical information across articles and solutions
A detailed view page for each technical article with formatted content display
A section for browsing and viewing solutions with filtering options by category or date
A detailed view page for each solution with structured presentation of problem and resolution
User authentication system supporting registration, login, and session management
A user profile page showing authored articles, contributed solutions, and communication history
A messaging or discussion feature enabling users to communicate with each other
A commenting system on articles and solutions to allow user interaction
Backend API endpoints for fetching articles, solutions, user data, and search results from a PostgreSQL database
Frontend components making HTTP requests to backend APIs for all dynamic data
Environment configuration setup using specified PostgreSQL connection variables
Package scripts in `package.json`: `install:all` for installing frontend and backend dependencies, and `dev` for running both concurrently
Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
